Animated Hamburger Menu Icon SVG

Demo

Intro

Here are two simple demos of the animated SVG Menu Icon. One by itself, and another inside a <button> element.

Click on them to toggle their states.

Animated SVG Icon

Click the hamburger menu icon below to toggle its state.


Use this button to remotely toggle the amimated menu icon's state

As A Button
